summary: BATTERY DIES.  HAD IT PROFESSIONALLY RECHARGED, LASTED 6 WEEKS AND BEGAN DYING AGAIN.  HAD TO JUMP START NUMEROUS TIMES. NOW BATTERY IS RUINED AND I NEED A NEW ALTERNATOR AND NEW BATTERY.  CAR IS 4 YEARS OLD WITH LESS THAN 30,000 MILES.  I AM 2ND OWNER, BOUGHT IT IN 11/2016 AT 24,000 MILES.
